channel.title: Looking for a RSPS-partner/staff?! Here I am: Can do LOTS of things!
channel.description:
[b]Hi there! :D[/b] Well for starters, let me just introduce myself. [i]Im Lee, 17 from Doncaster, England. Have played private servers for about 3-4years ago. Obviously started off when i heard about 'Frugooscape'. I have coded a private servers before which was delta-based (317) which got to the peak of about 40-50 players active at one time, with over 2,000 accounts created. Although i just didnt have enough spare time due to exams(which are all finished now). I have experianced what its liked to own a server, and now would just like to be part of the team.[/i]
[i]I would like to apply for in-game mod/admin/co-owner (just depending on what you want me to do, etc..), then once ive proved myself worthy, would love to work my way up the team. (in-game + forms).[/i]
[b]A few reasons to why you might want to partner with me/ have me in your team!:[/b] [i]*I would play 'YOUR SERVER' approx. 4hours per day monday to friday, then between 20-30 hours on the throughout the weekend. [u]excluding a few days (for my life)[/u] *i Would stay active online fourms aswell, getting rid of junk (spam) and answering questions. *I would create advertisments, eg- on different fourms, videos (youtube) and get the word out there for players/promotional purposes. * I can created banners etc, using 'Photoshop, illustrator, fireworks, etc..' * FULL of idea's! * In-game i will always be there for help, but will NOT abuse my powers. * I do not like giving away free stuff as this ruins the econemy. * Another good reason is that since i live in england, the time scale will be different to others, so i could be there when you aren't (if your from USA). * Also, can keep the advertisment on 'runelocus, rune-server, mopar etc..' up to date :-) (even write them for you) * I can help with coding (JAVA) * I am able to create 'good-standard' websites, through html coding. * I can make your server forums (if you have none) * ALWAYS HERE TO HELP WITH ALOT OF THINGS![/i]
[b][b]If you would like more infomation, please do contact me via PM or comment below! [/b] Hope to hear from you soon! Lee![/b]

item.title: Looking for a RSPS-partner/staff?! Here I am: Can do LOTS of things!
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“artem543, post:6, topic:440372”][quote author=kronixz link=topic=543049.msg3980093#msg3980093 date=1335134592]

here you arent!

what do you mean mate?

In your title: “Here I am:” His comment: “here you arent!”

lol
[/quote]
It’s not true?[/quote]
no you were exactly right

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a RSPS-partner/staff?! Here I am: Can do LOTS of things!
item.dc:creator: @Ljelvin Ljelvin
item.description:
@Ljelvin wrote:

Hi there!
Well for starters, let me just introduce myself.
Im Lee, 17 from Doncaster, England. Have played private servers for about 3-4years ago. Obviously started off when i heard about ‘Frugooscape’.
I have coded a private servers before which was delta-based (317) which got to the peak of about 40-50 players active at one time, with over 2,000 accounts created. Although i just didnt have enough spare time due to exams(which are all finished now). I have experianced what its liked to own a server, and now would just like to be part of the team.

I would like to apply for in-game mod/admin/co-owner (just depending on what you want me to do, etc…), then once ive proved myself worthy, would love to work my way up the team. (in-game + forms).

A few reasons to why you might want to partner with me/ have me in your team!:
[i]*I would play ‘YOUR SERVER’ approx. 4hours per day monday to friday, then between 20-30 hours on the throughout the weekend.
excluding a few days (for my life)
*i Would stay active online fourms aswell, getting rid of junk (spam) and answering questions.
*I would create advertisments, eg- on different fourms, videos (youtube) and get the word out there for players/promotional purposes.

  • I can created banners etc, using ‘Photoshop, illustrator, fireworks, etc…’
  • FULL of idea’s!
  • In-game i will always be there for help, but will NOT abuse my powers.
  • I do not like giving away free stuff as this ruins the econemy.
  • Another good reason is that since i live in england, the time scale will be different to others, so i could be there when you aren’t (if your from USA).
  • Also, can keep the advertisment on ‘runelocus, rune-server, mopar etc…’ up to date (even write them for you)
  • I can help with coding (JAVA)
  • I am able to create ‘good-standard’ websites, through html coding.
  • I can make your server forums (if you have none)
  • ALWAYS HERE TO HELP WITH ALOT OF THINGS![/i]

If you would like more infomation, please do contact me via PM or comment below!
Hope to hear from you soon!
Lee!

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a RSPS-partner/staff?! Here I am: Can do LOTS of things!
